HediffDef.label: Indomitable Aura
HediffDef.description: An aura brimming with an untold amount of power, capable of banishing the filth from the warp, and smiting the heretics of the imperium of man.

HediffDef.label: Trigger Happy Aura
HediffDef.description: An aura that widens the caster's field of vision and manipulation, elevating their ranged combat skills to new heights.

li.label: Trigger Happy Aura
li.description: The Emperor has sent me to redeem you, IN HOLY FIRE!!!
